DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety Vitamin D Receptor Activators Patients Ages 0 16 With Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 5 Receiving Peritoneal Dialysis Within Current Clinical Practice

DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female 0 16 year age ( inclusive ) , peritoneal dialysis least 30 day . 2 . The patient history secondary hyperparathyroidism define initiated vitamin D receptor activator treat elevate parathyroid hormone level . 3 . The patient attend site associate North America Pediatric Renal Trials Collaborative Studies ( NAPRTCS ) Dialysis Registry . 4 .
